data.text: @KeGathara @kishnjoro @DrAhmedKalebi @Nanjala1 @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher The name calling is really not necessary or did you just recently learn the word fascist? Bring the papers, I have presented the evidence I have in the link above.

@kishnjoro @DrAhmedKalebi @Nanjala1 @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher Simon, I am a scientist myself, so present the papers and we’ll critique them soberly without name calling. And if you want to see the evidence I alluded to, follow this thread that has the papers. Read then let’s have dialogue. https://t.co/fg38RpNISo

@gesbon1 @kurgatkogeyben @DrAhmedKalebi @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher So what is Schwab talking about then? Why do so many people in government belong to his organization? Why are we seeing policies coming up worldwide that are in line with the implementation of this great reset? Keep being willfully ignorant. It'll be too late when you wake up.

@chadbironga @JacquieOliwa @DrAhmedKalebi @Nanjala1 @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher When we remove our hearts from discussions, we get a clearer view of the situation.
Experts are the reason right now we are talking about mental health issues. They told government to shutdown without thinking outside of their actions.

@Kibet_SC @JacquieOliwa @DrAhmedKalebi @Nanjala1 @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher Actually Kenya reported less deaths in 2020 and 2021 compared to 2019

@JacquieOliwa @DrAhmedKalebi @Nanjala1 @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher I don't really agree with you on the children below 15yrs being vulnerable. If you can follow up, you'll find that most of the people who died of Covid-19 had underlying health issues. My children were infected way back in 2020, but the effect on them was not serious.
@DrAhmedKalebi @MOH_Kenya @daktari1 @YatichN @alykhansatchu @KenyaGovernors @InteriorKE @StateHouseKenya @KenyaMedics_KMA @Asmali77 @KResearcher Really! Is Corona gone from here?
